00009 #include <iostream>
00010 #include <math.h>
00011 
00012 static void
00013 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_MonoAreaTest(CuTest* tc)
00014 {
00015         double white_area, black_area;
00016 
00017         char *file = IMAGE_DIR "\\mask.bmp";
00018 
00019         FIBITMAP *dib = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(file);
00020         
00021         if(FreeImageAlgorithms_MonoImageFindWhiteFraction(dib, &white_area, &black_area) == FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR)
00022                 CuFail(tc, "Failed");
00023 
00024         FreeImage_Unload(dib);
00025 
00026         // float white_area = 0.540436;
00027         // white_area * 100 = 54.0436
00028         // 54.0436 + 0.5 = 54.5436
00029         // floor(54.5436) = 54
00030         // 54 / 100 = 0.54
00031         double x = floor(white_area*100+.05)/100;
00032 
00033         CuAssertTrue(tc, x == 0.54);
00034         CuAssertTrue(tc, white_area + black_area == 1.0);
00035 }
00036 
00037 static void
00038 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_MonoComparisonTest(CuTest* tc)
00039 {
00040         double white_area, black_area;
00041 
00042         char *file1 = IMAGE_DIR "\\texture.bmp";
00043         char *file2 = IMAGE_DIR "\\mask.bmp";
00044 
00045         FIBITMAP *dib1 = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(file1);
00046         FIBITMAP *dib2 = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(file2);
00047         
00048         int tp, tn, fp, fn;
00049 
00050         int error = FreeImageAlgorithms_MonoTrueFalsePositiveComparison(dib1, dib2,
00051                                                                                                         &tp, &tn, &fp, &fn);
00052 
00053         if(error == FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR)
00054                 CuFail(tc, "Failed");
00055 
00056         FreeImage_Unload(dib1);
00057         FreeImage_Unload(dib2);
00058 
00059         std::cout << "True Positive: " << tp
00060                 << "\nTrue Negative: " << tn
00061                 << "\nFalse Positive: " << fp
00062                 << "\nFalse Negative: " << fn << std::endl;
00063         
00064         //CuAssertTrue(tc, x == 0.54);
00065         //CuAssertTrue(tc, white_area + black_area == 1.0);
00066 }

00069 CuSuite* DLL_CALLCONV
00070 CuGetFreeImageAlgorithmsStatisticSuite(void)
00071 {
00072         CuSuite* suite = CuSuiteNew();
00073 
00074         SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, TestFreeImageAlgorithms_MonoAreaTest);
00075         SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, TestFreeImageAlgorithms_MonoComparisonTest);
00076 
00077         return suite;
00078 }
